description:
Sinbad, while using Valefor Djinn Equip.
In this form, Sinbad takes the form of a nine-tails fox with white fur. His hair changes to white in color and lengthens. His ears also elongates and look like ears of a fox. He also gains eyes on his palms which allows him to use http://anidb.net/ch84270 [Valefor]`s true ability by releasing some sort of waves.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Sinbad
